title: Modern Europe, 1914-Present
description: Examination of twentieth-century European history. Topics include: First World War, World Economic Crisis, communism, fascism, mass culture, shifting gender roles, Second World War, Cold War, Velvet Revolution, and the European Union. 4 lectures. Crosslisted as HIST/HNRS 335. Fulfills GE D5 except for History majors.
prerequisites: Completion of GE Area A and two courses from Area D1, D2 or D3
